data.Description (en): Moonriver is a fully Ethereum-compatible L1 on Kusama that mirrors Ethereum’s Web3 RPC, accounts, keys, subscriptions, logs, and more. Moonriver, a sister chain to Moonbeam, extends the base Ethereum feature set with additional features such as on-chain governance, staking, and specialized precompiles.
data.Description (zh): Moonriver是Kusama上完全兼容以太坊的 L1，它有与以太坊一样的Web3 RPC、账户、密钥、订阅、日志等。Moonriver是Moonbeam的姊妹链，它扩展了以太坊的基本功能集，并增加了链上治理、质押和专门的预编译等附加功能。
